name: Untitled (itch) (Deno)
description:
Key Binding:

W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move

R to play again 

Esc to quit the game

The game is about moving on good places to help you beat the boss. Both player and boss have 3 swords that rotating around that will attack each other if collide. The color of the floors that the player stand on will influence the parameters of the player, red color influences the length of the sword, green color influences the rotating speed of the sword, and blue color influences the player's moving speed, and on the edge or vertex of two or three floor tiles will powered up by all of them! The color of the floor will randomly change every 5 seconds. 

This is a rapid developed game that I spend 3 hours in total from thinking concept to finally built.
